name: Shinnyusha - Another Dimension
description:
Hello! 

I've decided to make this student project of mine public. This was a 1 semester long UE4 project I did in the Spring of 2021. Most of the finished models were painted in Photoshop. All the programming was done in Blueprints.

I'm hoping to make a big comeback to UE4 (or maybe even UE5) this semester for a senior project so I hope you enjoy this quirky little game of mine! I do not intend on extending this demo any further although I may return to this idea someday.

- Mechwolf 

Quick premise: You are an interdimensional traveler loses their memory after a journey through spacetime goes wrong. You find themselves in a deserted Japanese village with burning buildings and malicious spirits lurking about. Scavenge the village for clues to find out what happened and unlock your memories in this short demo chapter!
